column4: can i repartition my hard drive inside ubuntu, or do i have to use a live-cd if i want to repartition the partition i'm using? if that makes sense
You need to use a liveCD to partition any system partitions, such as /
you can format /home from an install, but i don't recommend it ;P
no, i have a partition i used to have another version of linux installed on, but now i want to merge it with /
